Subtask1.prompt: You are evaluating a generated product card for an e-commerce app.
questions: Is the main product clearly visible?
Is there exactly one primary focal object?
Is the background not overly cluttered?
Is the text legible at normal viewing size?
Is the color scheme consistent with the description?
Does the layout look professional overall?

Subtask1.prompt: You are evaluating a mobile app login screen design.
questions: Is the input field layout clear?
Is there a visible primary call-to-action button?
Is the text contrast sufficient for readability?
Is there no critical information cut off?
Would this be acceptable for a production app?

Subtask2.prompt: You are evaluating a hero banner for a landing page.
questions: Is there a clear main subject or message?
Is the headline area visually emphasized?
Is the background not distracting from the main subject?
Do colors feel coherent with a modern web design?
Would this hero section be usable on a real website?
